=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### 21530-232481: X-Ray Machine and Associated Equipment Procurement

Tender Reference Number: WS4317200683-Doc4328663737  
Contracting Entity: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
 
### Tender Details

*   **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Closed Date**: January 12, 2024, at 2PM EST
*   **Tender Location**: Drumheller Institution
*   **Delivery Location**: Same as tender location
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services - General
*   **Note**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Canada Buys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 12, 2024 at 2PM EST. Bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Product Specifications
The tender involves the supply, delivery, and installation of an X-Ray Machine and associated equipment. The specifications for the products are detailed in the Annex Statement of Requirement, and the requirements for removal of old equipment are outlined in the same document.

### Trade Agreements and Preferential Treatment
This procurement process is subject to the participation of suppliers from any country and to suppliers that may benefit from preferential treatment under various trade agreements. Suppliers wishing to participate in this tender must fulfill the requirements listed in the applicable trade agreements.

### Tenders Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
Tenders must be submitted in accordance with the requirements listed in the Annex Statement of Requirement. The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price in accordance with the Evaluation and Award Criteria listed in the Contract Award Document.

### Procurement Documents
Tenders are invited electronically through the Bid Facility website available at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca).

### Supplier Communication and Contact Information
Myers-Labbe, André (SPAC/PSPC) is the contract authority. He can be reached at [andre.myers-labbe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andre.myers-labbe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
